item.title: Hugo: How to Install Share Buttons in Your Posts
item.description: Prerequisites Code Editor: A software used for editing code. Can be anything from Sublime Text, Visual Studio Code, Atom, or another texteditor. For this tutorial, I personally used Visual Studio Code. The installation steps. Download the file share-buttons.html and save it under the folder layouts/partials directory of your project. Add the following line to your layout on the place where you want the share button appear. {{ partial "share-buttons.
